oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Veteran’s Administration Hospital, 1962 August 28
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Aerial views of the Veterans Administration Hospital building in Nashville, Tennessee, August 28th, 1962, located at Twenty-fourth Avenue S and Garland. Vanderbilt University’s Morgan Towers can be seen in the foreground. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 2 photograph negatives : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Vanderbilt University
